original_text: and said to Moses, “The people bring much more than enough for doing the work that the Lord has commanded us to do.”
korean_text: 모세에게 말하여 이르되 백성이 너무 많이 가져오므로 여호와께서 명령하신 일에 쓰기에 남음이 있나이다

sentences.original_text: “The people bring much more than enough
sentences.korean_translation: “백성이 필요한 것보다 훨씬 더 많이 가져옵니다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord has commanded us to do.”
